description: Very fun to toy around and see how the AI generates the playlist from A to Z. Missing any modern tracks from Spotify though, so -1 for that
It would be nice if the AI could genereate songs in the same genre such as if one wants to listen to Christian music only.
Always 30 seconds sucks extremely. There sould be configs, ways to train the AI, star ratings etc.
summary: Interesting Approach but too little configurations
